about_the_game:
Guildmaster's Edition (over $100 of in-game items)
This legendary pack contains everything in the Warden Edition and takes it to the next level with even more exclusive Solari variants, the full set of Starter Solari, and more!

  • Moonrise Base Game
  • 4-Star Emberjaw
  • 4-Star Snaptrap
  • 4-Star Nemony
  • 4-Star Graveljaw
  • 4-Star Zaptrap
  • 4-Star Khemony
  • 2x Solari Booster (6x Solari each, with a guaranteed 4-star in each booster)
  • 10000 Gold
  • 3000 Gems
  • 1x EXCLUSIVE Ebon Kitzapp Solari Skin
  • 1x EXCLUSIVE Snowy Crownlord Solari Skin
detailed_description:
Guildmaster's Edition (over $100 of in-game items)
This legendary pack contains everything in the Warden Edition and takes it to the next level with even more exclusive Solari variants, the full set of Starter Solari, and more!

  • Moonrise Base Game
  • 4-Star Emberjaw
  • 4-Star Snaptrap
  • 4-Star Nemony
  • 4-Star Graveljaw
  • 4-Star Zaptrap
  • 4-Star Khemony
  • 2x Solari Booster (6x Solari each, with a guaranteed 4-star in each booster)
  • 10000 Gold
  • 3000 Gems
  • 1x EXCLUSIVE Ebon Kitzapp Solari Skin
  • 1x EXCLUSIVE Snowy Crownlord Solari Skin

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mavericks (version 10.9)
  • Processor: 2.53 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9400M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX Yosemite (version 10.10)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Moonrise Base Game + Guildmaster's Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.86GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GSO/ Radeon HD 2600 XT / Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 450 \ Radeon HD 5850 \ Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Guildmaster's Edition — Includes Moonrise base game, two exclusive Solari skins, and a bundle with even more premium in-game content at less than the regular price.
